title: Calling all artists and creative souls! Would you like to spread your wings and be a part of a joyful...

attachments.displayName:
Calling all artists and creative souls! Would you like to spread your wings and be a part of a joyful art adventure with artists from all over the world? I'd love for you to be a part of my art installation and exhibit on November 30th!! It's as easy as creating a feather out of recycled materials. We already have 50 artists from all around the world including Canada, USA, UK, France, New Zealand and Australia and we would love for you to join us!!! Please click here for all the details! http://www.avoxtar.com/2013/10/19/calling-all-artists-and-creative-souls-collaborative-art-installation/

This is going to be so much fun! Warm thanks and bright beams of positive thoughts and energy to you! Please help us spread the word by sharing this post! Thanks !

object.content:
Calling all artists and creative souls! Would you like to spread your wings and be a part of a joyful art adventure with artists from all over the world? I'd love for you to be a part of my art installation and exhibit on November 30th!! It's as easy as creating a feather out of recycled materials. We already have 50 artists from all around the world including Canada, USA, UK, France, New Zealand and Australia and we would love for you to join us!!! Please click here for all the details! http://www.avoxtar.com/2013/10/19/calling-all-artists-and-creative-souls-collaborative-art-installation/

This is going to be so much fun! Warm thanks and bright beams of positive thoughts and energy to you! Please help us spread the word by sharing this post! Thanks !
Thanks +John Kampsen ! I do hope you'll decide to join the adventure! ;-)
